sections.heading: Deposits
Penalty
506.501-506.519 shall be known and may be cited as the “Carts, Cases, Baskets, Boxes, and Containers Act.”
sections.text: 506.501-506.519 shall be known and may be cited as the “Carts, Cases, Baskets, Boxes, and Containers Act.”

sections.heading: For the purposes of ss. 506.501-506
sections.text: 519, the term:(1)“Bakery container” means any permanent type of container which is used by a bakery, distributor, retailer, or food service establishment or the agent of any of them as a means to transport, store, or carry bakery products.(2)“Dairy case” means a w

sections.heading: The requiring, taking, or accepting of any deposit upon delivery of any shopping cart, laundry cart, dairy case, egg basket, poultry box, or bakery container shall not be deemed a sale thereof, optional or otherwise
Any person who violates any of the provisions of ss
sections.text: 506.501-506.519 is guilty of a misdemeanor of the first degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.History.—s. 1, ch. 83-262; s. 10, ch. 87-80; s. 126, ch. 91-224.
